sqlMap.select: SELECT KPI_SET_ID, PAR_KPI_SET_ID, KPI_SET_LEVEL, KPI_SET_NAME, CASE PAR_KPI_SET_ID WHEN 'main-1' THEN KPI_SET_URL WHEN 'main-4' THEN KPI_SET_URL ELSE CONCAT( KPI_SET_URL, '?kpiSetId=', KPI_SET_ID ) END AS KPI_SET_URL, KPI_SET_SEQ FROM KPI_SET ORDER BY PAR_KPI_SET_ID,KPI_SET_SEQ

SELECT KS.KPI_SET_ID, KS.PAR_KPI_SET_ID, KS.KPI_SET_LEVEL, KS.KPI_SET_NAME, CASE KS.KPI_SET_URL WHEN '' THEN NULL ELSE CONCAT( KS.KPI_SET_URL, '?kpiSetId=', KS.KPI_SET_ID, '&download=', PRM.MENU_DOWNLOAD ) END AS KPI_SET_URL, KPI_SET_SEQ FROM PER_USERS PU INNER JOIN PER_ROLE_USER PRU ON PU.USER_ID = PRU.USER_ID INNER JOIN PER_ROLE_MENU PRM ON PRU.ROLE_ID = PRM.ROLE_ID INNER JOIN KPI_SET KS ON KS.KPI_SET_ID = PRM.MENU_ID WHERE PU.USER_NAME = #USER_NAME# ORDER BY KPI_SET_SEQ

SELECT S.KPI_SET_ID, G.KPI_GROUP_ID, G.KPI_GROUP_NAME, G.CHART_STYLE_ID, G.TIP FROM KPI_SET S JOIN KPI_SET_AND_KPI_GROUP_RELA R ON S.KPI_SET_ID = R.KPI_SET_ID JOIN KPI_GROUP G ON R.KPI_GROUP_ID = G.KPI_GROUP_ID ORDER BY KPI_SET_ID, KPI_GROUP_ID
